title: Special Edition: Luca Solca on ‘The Worst Year in the History of Modern Luxury’

description:
BoF’s Imran Amed and the Bernstein analyst discuss what the sector should expect as coronavirus threatens sales and supply chains.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
